house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1941 has 6 bedroom(s), 7 bath(s) , 3 car attached garage and approximately 7200 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, air conditioning, french doors.
house_listing.firm_name: Wimbish-Riteway Re Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Central Vacuum, Dishwasher, Fenced, Foyer, French Doors,Kitchen Island, Ocean Access, Outdoor Grill, Outdoor Shower, Pantry,Smoke Detector, Trash Compacter, Walk-In Closet(s)
